snippet: Coach McAdoo did not endorse Beckham’s complaints about officiating Sunday, but he did not chastise him, either....
abstract: New York Giants coach Ben McAdoo suggests he will send video of calls he considers questionable during team's recent loss to Pittsburgh Steelers to NFL for review; does not endorse receiver Odell Beckham Jr's call to have officiating crew barred from working team's future games.
lead_paragraph: Coach McAdoo did not endorse Beckham’s complaints about officiating Sunday, but he did not chastise him, either.

headline.main: Giants’ Ben McAdoo Wants Calls on Odell Beckham Jr. Reviewed
headline.print_headline: His Coach Wants Calls on Beckham Reviewed
